newsitem.title: UK: Business thin on ground in sugar freight market.
newsitem.headline: Business thin on ground in sugar freight market.

text.p: New sugar freight business was exceedingly thin on Wednesday with only one new order emerging, shipbrokers said. Australian shipper CSR quoted for a hefty 38,250 tonnes of bulk sugar from Queensland to Adabiya for 18/28 September. "It's very quiet -- the sugar list gets shorter and shorter every day," said one broker.
"It's been dead for the last couple of months."
